summary: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender, thinking he's a wealthy suitor.
cast: Audrey Tautou|Gad Elmaleh|Marie-Christine Adam|Vernon Dobtcheff|Jacques Spiesser|Annelise Hesme|Charlotte Vermeil|Claudine Baschet|Laurent Claret|Jean de Coninck|Blandine Pélissier|Philippe Vendan-Borin|Bernard Bourdeau|Didier Brice|Laurent Mouton|Frédéric Bocquet|Jean-Michel Lahmi|Luc Chavy|Guillaume Verdier
title: Un engaño de lujo
